org.lrima.laop.utils

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lrima.laop.utils.MathUtils

  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for java.math utilities that are not present in the java Math class
    Author:
    Clement Bisaillon

      • nearZero

        public static boolean nearZero(double number)
        Used to know if a decimal number is near zero. The precision is 0.0001.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to test
        Returns:
        true if the number is near 0, false otherwise.

      • segmentIntersection

        public static float[] segmentIntersection(float p0x,
                                          float p0y,
                                          float p1x,
                                          float p1y,
                                          float p2x,
                                          float p2y,
                                          float p3x,
                                          float p3y)
        Checks for an intersection between two segment. Line1 (p0x, p0y, p1x, p1y) Line2 (p2x, p2y, p3x, p3y)
        Parameters:
        p0x - line 1 point 1 x
        p0y - line 1 point 1 y
        p1x - line 1 point 2 x
        p1y - line 1 point 2 y
        p2x - line 2 point 1 x
        p2y - line 2 point 1 y
        p3x - line 2 point 2 x
        p3y - line 2 point 2 y
        Returns:
        null if there is no intersection, the Vector2D containing the point if there is

      • rectSegmentIntersection

        public static boolean rectSegmentIntersection(float p0x,
                                              float p0y,
                                              float p1x,
                                              float p1y,
                                              float r0x,
                                              float r0y,
                                              float r1x,
                                              float r1y,
                                              float r2x,
                                              float r2y,
                                              float r3x,
                                              float r3y)
        Checks for an collision of a rectangle and a line Line1 (p0x, p0y, p1x, p1y) Rect1 (r0x, r0y, r1x, r1y, r2x, r2y, r3x, r3y)
        Parameters:
        p0x - line's point 1 x
        p0y - line's point 1 y
        p1x - line's point 2 x
        p1y - line's point 2 y
        r0x - rect's point 1 x
        r0y - rect's point 1 y
        r1x - rect's point 2 x
        r1y - rect's point 2 y
        r2x - rect's point 3 x
        r2y - rect's point 3 y
        r3x - rect's point 4 x
        r3y - rect's point 4 y
        Returns:
        true if the line intersects the rectangle, false otherwise
